attributes.additional_details: Jess got diagnosed with cervical cancer in april 2013. She had been to the doctors 9 times previous with really bad pain. She didnt get offered a smear test because of her age, 22. It then ended up spreading and sadly jess lost her battle on 22nd february 2014. We really need the age lowered for smear tests!!

rejection.details: Please see: Lower the age for a smear test to 20
